channel.title: Immunity Redefining Pking
channel.description:
Immunity is a new up and coming server which is going to be run with the community choice as a main factor. We will be using Near-reality as our (Don't click away yet) but we're using it mostly for stability, we may remove the customs etc. depending on how the community picks.
FAQ:
Q. What do you mean by community choice as main factor? A. What this means is that the community will pick alot if not all of the content via polls on forums, example a poll could be with a simple yes or no asking if the community wants pest control, whichever wins will happen.
Q. What makes you different from any other NR remake? A. We will NOT be a NR remake, we are using Near-reality as the source with some aspects of NR we are branching out from NR and do not have intentions of remaking NR
Q. Will Items be kept after Beta A. It depends if beta goes dupe free and there's not items discontinued Client download [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/nw47tt2532i93t0/Immunity_2.1.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/download/nw47tt2532i93t0/Immunity_2.1.zip[/url] Forums Client download [url=http://www.immunity-ps.com/forums]http://www.immunity-ps.com/forums[/url] Vote [url=http://www.immunity-ps.com/vote]http://www.immunity-ps.com/vote[/url] [CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER] -Active and helpful staff team -Active open minded owner -Friendly and loyal players -Auto-vote fully configured -Nex monster with multi drops -Tons of monsters to hunt! -Neat and organized forums -Constant updates and tweaks! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aIHBWat.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rKLZn1J.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0003.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0006.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0007.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0008.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0009.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0010.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h412/sk8erg7/NRPK0013.png[/img] Will add more pics as I add more stuff, forums are incomplete atm. item.title: Immunity Redefining Pking
item.dc:creator: @Gaigee Gaigee
item.description:
@Gaigee wrote:

Immunity is a new up and coming server which is going to be run with the community choice as a main factor. We will be using Near-reality as our (Don’t click away yet) but we’re using it mostly for stability, we may remove the customs etc. depending on how the community picks.

FAQ:

Q. What do you mean by community choice as main factor?
A. What this means is that the community will pick alot if not all of the content via polls on forums, example a poll could be with a simple yes or no asking if the community wants pest control, whichever wins will happen.

Q. What makes you different from any other NR remake?
A. We will NOT be a NR remake, we are using Near-reality as the source with some aspects of NR we are branching out from NR and do not have intentions of remaking NR

Q. Will Items be kept after Beta
A. It depends if beta goes dupe free and there’s not items discontinued
